channel.title: How?
channel.description: How Can I Make A Portal Stop You Teleing If You Are Tele Blocked???

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @GoldenShard GoldenShard
item.description:
@GoldenShard wrote:

[quote=“bluurr, post:2, topic:87551”]try

case xxxx: // change xxxx to potal id if(!teleblock) { sendMessage("add send msg here"); teleportToX = xxxx; //add tele cood here teleportToY = xxxx; //add tele cood here } else if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } break; [/quote]

Exactly what bluurr said.

Read full topic

item.title: How?
item.dc:creator: @bluurr bluurr
item.description:
@bluurr wrote:

try

case xxxx:   // change xxxx to potal id
if(!teleblock)
{
sendMessage("add send msg here");
teleportToX = xxxx; //add tele cood here
teleportToY = xxxx; //add tele cood here
}
else if(teleblock)
{
sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting.");
}
break;

Read full topic
